name: In the Matter of the ESTATE of Daniel B. KIMMEL, Deceased, late of Conemaugh Township, Cambria County, Appellant
name_abbreviation: In re the Estate of Kimmel

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: In the Matter of the ESTATE of Daniel B. KIMMEL, Deceased, late of Conemaugh Township, Cambria County, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Decree of the court below affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: R. L. Pawlowski, Johnstown, for appellant.
Gilbert E. Caroff, Johnstown, Thomas M. Mulroy, Henry M. Wick, Jr., Wick, Vuono & Lavelle, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
356 A.2d 359
In the Matter of the ESTATE of Daniel B. KIMMEL, Deceased, late of Conemaugh Township, Cambria County, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1976.
Decided May 12, 1976.
R. L. Pawlowski, Johnstown, for appellant.
Gilbert E. Caroff, Johnstown, Thomas M. Mulroy, Henry M. Wick, Jr., Wick, Vuono & Lavelle, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
